name: emulate
description: Run Android emulator and iOS simulator easily from VScode!

emulator.simulatorPath.description: The absolute path of your Xcode simulator directory containing the Simulator.app script. Leaving it empty will automatically select the path with xcode-select -p.

emulator.emulatorPath.description: The absolute path of your Android emulator directory containing the emulator script.

emulator.emulatorPathMac.description: The absolute path of the Android emulator directory on your MacBook containing the emulator script.

emulator.emulatorPathLinux.description: The absolute path of the Android emulator directory on your Linux containing the emulator script.

emulator.emulatorPathWindows.description: The absolute path of the Android emulator directory on your Windows containing the emulator script.

emulator.androidColdBoot.description: Show an option to cold boot android devices.

emulator.androidExtraBootArgs.description: Add extra boot args to the android emulator.

emulator.hasEditorTitleIcon.description: Show the emulator icon in the editor bar on the top right.
